heading: HB08193
0: AN ACT CREATING THE NATIONAL ROAD SAFETY BOARD AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION since 2018-09-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08193
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING THE NATIONAL ROAD SAFETY BOARD AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to address the alarming number of road crash-related deaths in the country which calls for immediate countermeasures in order to curb such increasing leading cause of deaths. Calls for the creation of a road safety board responsible for synthesizing all these countermeasures.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2018-09-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
